[Max money]
D3000000 1495BDE0
00000000 0098967F
D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

[++ASM versions++]

FP Code (R=Max FP, L=0FP, R+L=Off)
DD000000 00000100
00265DD4 E3A00FE1
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000200
00265DD4 E3A00000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000300
00265DD4 E0800003
D2000000 00000000
{R sets FP after gain to Max FP. L sets FP after 'gain' to 0. L+R disables the effect. Effects apply to both teams, so they have to be manually toggled/deactivated every turn to avoid undesired effects}
[--]

[--]

[++Use Vivosaur in Battle Codes++]

[!!!See Note here for code usage!!!]
{The below codes replace your active Vivosaur in battle with the one selected. They have their own stats and moves. "Use Regular Vivosaurs in Battle" code disables the effect of the other codes.}

[Use Beta Vivosaur in Battle]
002C62C4 E3A00010
002C62CC E3A01010
002C6300 E3A02010
00443068 E3A08010
002440E8 E3A00010
002440FC E3A00010
D3000000 1495C7EE
20000000 00000001
20000024 0000001E
20000025 00000001
20000026 00000064
20000028 00000064
20000029 00000001
2000002A 00000064
2000002C 00000064
2000002D 00000001
2000002E 00000064
20000030 00000064
20000031 00000001
20000032 00000064
20000034 00000064
D2000000 00000000
{Replaces active Vivosaur when battle starts}

002C62CC E3A01054
002C6300 E3A02054
00443068 E3A08054
002440E8 E3A00054
002440FC E3A00054

[--]

[++Unused Paleo Pal Codes++]

[!!!See Note here for code usage!!!]
{To use properly, click to go into a dig site. Then, click A on one of your Paleo Pals before entering and then back out. Your Paleo Pals will be replaced with the ones below. These codes will make it so you're alone in tournament play, so disable them when you enter a tournament. This isn't a problem though, as these characters would crash tournaments anyways.}
{Stryker uses Prehistoric Tyrannosaurus. Prof. Little uses Prehistoric Sauroposeidon. Dr. Blackraven uses Prehistoric Triceratops.}

[Use Stryker and Prof. Little]
207DEC45 0000001D
207DEC46 0000001E

[Use Stryker and Blackraven]
207DEC45 0000001D
207DEC46 0000001F

[Use Prof. Little and Blackraven]
207DEC45 0000001E
207DEC46 0000001F

[--]


[++Your Vivosaur Stat Codes++]

[!!!See Notes here for code usage!!!]
{When the battle starts, you'll see your Vivosaur on the leftmost part of the field. During this time, Hold L+R and your Vivosaur's stats will be modified. If L+R is held while a Paleo Pal is in the leftmost field slot, their stats will be modified too, so don't hold L+R for too long.
{HP codes might be good to emulate having a boss Vivosaur, especially in combination with the "Use Vivosaur" codes.}

[Your Vivosaur Starts Out With 999 HP (L+R)]
DD000000 00000300
4FFFE240 14000000
3FFFE240 15000000
BFFFE240 00000000
10000150 000003E7
10000154 000003E7
D2000000 00000000
{Start out with the 2nd Dreadraven's battle HP. Might revert to normal after attack unless Rank 30.}

BFFFE240 00000000
10000150 00000320
10000154 00000320
D2000000 00000000
{Start out with the 1st Dreadraven's battle HP. Might revert to normal after attack unless Rank 30.}

[++Fossil excavation++]

[Infinite time]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
400000C8 41200000
000000C8 42C70000
D2000000 00000000
{Dig as long as you like. Picks can break this code.}

[Ignore [most] damage]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
8000031C 00000000
1000031C 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Can't prevent damage from the final hit. Picks can break this code.May cause crashes if on during tournaments.}

[Fully excavated (R)]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
DD000000 00000100
00000324 0000FFFF
D2000000 00000000
{Doesnt remove damage. Use if rogue vivosaur gets too close. Picks might break this code.}
